The leaky buckets and flume that carry water for the mill are being repaired with money raised by the Blue Ridge Parkway Foundation in Winston - Salem , N.C. When in working order , the flume will fill each bucket with 12 gallons of water , which causes the mill 's grindstones to turn and grind corn into meal for demonstration purposes .
